content:
# elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord Daily Update (Dec 18, 2025)
## OVERVIEW 
Today's development focused on a significant new feature: implementing a Discord channel history spider with persisted state, centralizing message-to-memory building, and enhancing attachment/voice transcription utilities.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### Enhanced Discord Channel History and Memory Management
*   Implemented a Discord channel history spider with persisted state, allowing for more robust data collection.
*   Centralized the process of building memories from messages, streamlining data processing.
*   Upgraded utilities for attachments and voice transcription, including better logging and chunking capabilities. ([#30](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord/pull/30))

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
No new pull requests were opened today.

## CLOSED ISSUES
No issues were closed today.

## NEW ISSUES
No new issues were reported today.

## ACTIVE ISSUES
No active issues with more than 3 comments.
